okay so expertise location i'm sure that you're all aware that this
is probably a major problem in any organization which has more than one office or maybe more than one hallway of
employees once you get to a certain size you don't know everyone anymore and the problem
that comes with that is you don't know who can help you you know when i'm doing my task who can actually help me achieve
that today who can help me connect me to that customer that i'm trying to chase
so we had a large wholesale bank who changed the way that they attacked
this problem through the use of timber they have a role in the bank called a relationship manager which is
responsible for taking care of new customers that come in and
actually satisfy them with their requests with a particular product of the bank
the problem is that sometimes these relationship managers don't know the industry that the particular customer is
coming from or aren't maybe that familiar with the complex product that the customer is seeking because maybe
it's a very specific issue that they're trying to solve wholesale bank has many many products
so what would happen in the past is that a relationship manager would get this
request reach out to their personal network you know pick up the phone call a few
colleagues maybe send a few emails this process usually was over the time
of about three weeks that they would canvas the results of you know who can help me what is the right
product i should be recommending and usually the result wasn't positive you think
about it most people only know a handful of people in the organization and they're not really tapping into the full
pool of knowledge at a large organization like a bank so they they thought there had to be a
better way so the way they approach this with the use of tiva is that through tibba and
the social networking capability of it is that this request can actually go out to all of the relationship managers and
specifically ones that had actually had expertise in the areas of the industry
that the customer was approaching potentially the deal type that they were doing so maybe oil and gas
and a particular type of product in the wholesale bank so they actually automated some of this and

message from management in your team potentially here is some new safety procedures that you need to be doing

or something like that so as you can see it was very one-directional there was no chance for that cabin crew

these employees now through their smartphones and tablet devices can actually receive

sharing rosters with each other because before they had no way officially to communicate some of them had started

know business related matters now they had a private secure channel to be able to
talk about hey i received this roster for next month i'm actually going to be away for that first week due to a
